constituent: holy, ear, mouth, king, jewel, ball
koohiiStory1: The trick for me is to remember that the 耳 is to the left of the 口. However, this is easy because a true holy man uses his ear to listen (i.e., to God or his supplicant) before he opens his mouth to speak, unlike a charlatan who just makes something up. Of course, kings are often true holy men and prophets (e.g., King David in the bible).
koohiiStory2: A holy man hears with his ears before he speaks with his mouth, which places him higher than a king in people´s esteem.
myStory: thánh. thần. chủ. tai miệng của vua
